ongoing-courses.title: Digital Marketing
ongoing-courses.description: Learn the strategies and tools needed to succeed in digital marketing. Covering SEO, social media, email marketing, and more.

ongoing-courses.title: Data Science
ongoing-courses.description: Dive deep into data science concepts, tools, and techniques. Learn to analyze and visualize data to make informed decisions.

ongoing-courses.title: Graphic Design
ongoing-courses.description: Explore the principles of graphic design and learn how to create visually appealing and effective designs using various tools and software.

ongoing-courses.title: Finance
ongoing-courses.description: Gain a comprehensive understanding of financial principles, investment strategies, and risk management techniques.
